alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 5:31PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Jefferson, northeastern Madison, southwestern Lanier, Lowndes and southern Brooks Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 531 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of Quitman to 14 miles northwest of Madison. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lake Park, Quitman, Valdosta, Lakeland, I-75 At Exit 16, Moody Air Force Base, Remerton, Meigs, Dasher, Grooverville, Barretts, Hamburg, Pinetta, Lovett, Nankin, Empress, Clyattville, Brooks Co A/p, Hanson and I-75 At Exit 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida...and south central Georgia.
